title: The Road to Nowhere
description: Nowhere and Somewhere are two cities connected by a past that almost no one remembers. Cerulean and Amarillo Saffron are sisters separated by guilt, regret, and a nine-year-old secret. Mayor Orange of Somewhere wants the Roy G. Biv highway built. It will connect Nowhere and Somewhere and, he hopes, create jobs for both cities. Not everyone agrees with him. Who are the Outlawz? Are they behind the road sabotage? How does the spooky-and-elusive Mayor Blue fit in? Who are the Lost Children of Nowhere? Can they be saved? Follow The ROAD TO NOWHERE to find out! All hope is never lost. Not even in Nowhere.
author: Shana Hammaker
